mapper.insert: insert into message (type, sender_id, receiver_id, title, content, target_id, is_read, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{type}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{targetId}, #{isRead}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select count(*) from message where receiver_id = #{userId} and is_read = 0
mapper.update: update message set is_read = 1, update_time = now() where id = #{messageId}
update message set is_read = 1, update_time = now() where receiver_id = #{userId} and is_read = 0
mapper.select: select count(1) from message where id = #{id}

SELECT FROM message WHERE type = 2 AND ( -- 当前用户作为发送者的消息（可以看到所有状态，包括status=2,3） (sender_id = #{userId1} AND receiver_id = #{userId2}) OR -- 当前用户作为接收者的消息（只能看到status=1的消息） (sender_id = #{userId2} AND receiver_id = #{userId1} AND status = 1) ) ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM message WHERE type = 2 AND receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND sender_id = #{senderId} AND is_read = 0 AND status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET is_read = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE type = 2 AND receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND sender_id = #{senderId} AND is_read = 0
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM message m INNER JOIN conversation c ON ( (c.user_id_1 = #{userId} AND (m.sender_id = c.user_id_2 OR m.receiver_id = c.user_id_2)) OR (c.user_id_2 = #{userId} AND (m.sender_id = c.user_id_1 OR m.receiver_id = c.user_id_1)) ) WHERE m.type = 2 AND m.create_time = c.last_message_time ORDER BY c.last_message_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
